item.title: Added haikei.app
item.description: https://www.haikei.app/ - Haikei is a web app to generate unique SVG shapes, backgrounds, and patterns – ready to use with your design tools and workflow.

item.title: Added Fleek
item.description: https://fleek.co/ - Build modern sites and apps on the Open Web and its protocols seamlessly free for, unlimited websites and 50 GB/month bandwidth.

item.title: Add Argonaut under PaaS category
item.description: https://argonaut.dev/ - Deploy apps and infrastructure on your cloud in minutes. Support for custom and third-party app deployments on Kubernetes and Lambda environments. Free tier allows unlimited apps and deployments for 5 environments and 2 users.

item.title: Add cogram.com
item.description: https://www.cogram.com/old-home - Cogram uses artificial intelligence to give you code suggestions in Jupyter Notebook. 1,000 code generations/month for free.

item.title: Add hex.tech
item.description: https://hex.tech/ - a collaborative data platform for notebooks, data apps and knowledge libraries. Free community version with up to 3 authors and 5 projects. One compute profile per author with 4GB RAM.

item.title: Add Befonts
item.description: https://befonts.com/ - Provides several unqiue fonts for personal or commercial use.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description:
https://supportivekoala.com/ - Allows you to autogenerate images by your input via templates. Free plan allows you to create up to 100 images per week.
http://inumbo.com/ - SMTP based spam filter, free for 10 users

item.title: use https for links
item.description:
https://chiselapp.com/ - Unlimited public and private Fossil repositories
https//supportivekoala.com/ - Allows you to autogenerate images by your input via templates. Free plan allows you to create up to 100 images per week.
https://wolfram.com/language/ - Built-in knowledge-based algorithms in the cloud.
https://eva.pingutil.com/ - Free email validator API, which helps to identify whether an email is disposable and having valid MX records.
https://inumbo.com/ - SMTP based spam filter, free for 10 users
https://mailmenot.io - Free disposable temporary email service with ability to add multiple email addresses
https://www.yopmail.fr/en/ - Disposable email addresses
https://freehostingnoads.net/ - — Free Hosting With PHP 5, Perl, CGI, MySQL, FTP, File Manager, POP E-Mail, free sub-domains, free domain hosting, DNS Zone Editor, Web Site Statistics, FREE Online Support and many more features not offered by other free hosts.
https://cloud.yugabyte.com - YugabyteDB is a distributed SQL database compatible with PostgresSQL. The cloud free tier is a 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM, 10GB Disk.
https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/ - REST API endpoints that return some fake data in JSON format. The source code is also available if you would like to run the server locally.
https://s-macke.github.io/jor1k/demos/main.html - a OpenRISC virtual machine capable of running Linux with network support.
